模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Level.LevelView

类 LevelViewLevelTwo

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelView.LevelView
com.example.demo.Level.LevelView.LevelViewLevelTwo
public class LevelViewLevelTwo extends LevelView
Represents the level view for Level 2, responsible for managing and displaying elements such as the boss health bar, shield, hint, and other level-specific UI elements.

This class handles the user interface (UI) components for the second level, such as the shield image, the boss's health bar, and the hint. It also provides methods to update the positions of these elements based on the boss's current position and updates to the boss's health.

  • 字段概要

    说明

    The health bar that shows the current health of the boss.

    root
    The root container of the scene where the UI elements will be added.
    private final ShieldImage
    shieldImage
    The shield image displayed for the boss when it is shielded.

  • 字段详细资料

    • root

      private final javafx.scene.Group root

    • shieldImage

      The shield image displayed for the boss when it is shielded.

      The health bar that shows the current health of the boss.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • LevelViewLevelTwo

      public LevelViewLevelTwo(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, int bossHealth)
      Constructs a LevelViewLevelTwo instance with the specified root group, hearts to display, and the boss's health for the health bar.

      This constructor initializes the necessary UI components, such as the shield image, boss health bar, and the hint, and adds them to the root container of the scene.

      参数:
      root - the root container of the scene where the UI elements will be added.
      heartsToDisplay - the initial number of hearts to display on the UI.
      bossHealth - the health of the boss to be displayed in the health bar.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeUI

      private void initializeUI()
      Initializes the user interface for Level 2 by adding the shield image, boss health bar, and hint to the root container. This method is run on the JavaFX application thread to ensure that UI updates are performed on the correct thread.

      The shield image, boss health bar, and hint are added to the root container, and their visibility is updated using the Platform.runLater(java.lang.Runnable) method to ensure UI elements are shown on the screen.

    • updateShieldPosition

      public void updateShieldPosition(Boss boss)
      Updates the position of the shield image relative to the boss's current position.

      This method ensures that the shield image follows the boss's movement on the screen.

      参数:
      boss - the boss whose position is used to update the shield's position.

    • showShield

      public void showShield()
      Shows the shield image on the UI.

      This method is used to make the shield image visible when the boss is shielded.

    • hideShield

      public void hideShield()
      Hides the shield image from the UI.

      This method is used to hide the shield image when the boss is no longer shielded.

    • updateBossHealthPosition

      public void updateBossHealthPosition(Boss boss)
      Updates the position of the boss health bar relative to the boss's current position.

      This method ensures that the health bar remains positioned correctly above the boss.

      参数:
      boss - the boss whose position is used to update the health bar's position.

    • updateBossHealth

      public void updateBossHealth(int bossHealth)
      Updates the health displayed on the boss's health bar.

      This method is used to update the health bar to reflect the current health of the boss.

      参数:
      bossHealth - the current health of the boss.
